i think this is a CMake issue recently introduced. THC/CMakeLists.txt needs to always link against cusparse now, rather than only when Magma is around:

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THC/CMakeLists.txt#L228

This issue was introduced in the CUDA sparse PR
